numlitem.para: Flight remains within 90 minutes of a suitable landing airport, and
Procedures do not require use of HF Radio.

note.para: If Primary Fan is inoperative, select ALTN on the overhead equipment cooling panel.

numlitem.para: Flight restricted to 90 minutes from a suitable landing airport.

note.para: Procedures do not require use of HF radio.

placard.para: Placard near ALTN Equip Cooling switch (overhead panel) "FWD EQUIP COOLING FAN INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

maintenance.para: Maintenance procedure is not required. All UPS 757 A/C have 90 minute symbol generators installed.
